title: Encode Integer
text:
Given an integer N(0 â‰¤ N < 107), find the smallest positive integer M(M > 0)such that the product of digits of M equals N.InputThe first line of input is T(the total number of test cases), followed by T(T < 10001)lines, each containing an integer N.OutputFor each integer N, output in a separate line the integer M, or -1(if encoding is not possible).ExampleInput:3
24
5
11Output:38
5
-1
